sentences.en: As a well - known contemporary historian, archeologist and expert in the study of paleography and document.
sentences.cn: 作为当今负有盛名的历史学家 、 考古学家、古文字学家和文献学家,李学勤先生早期的治学经历却十分独特.

sentences.en: Courses include Latin, paleography, as well as courses in the history and literature of these periods.
sentences.cn: 课程包括拉丁语、古文字学和那些时期的历史文学。

sentences.en: On the basis of philological and paleography evidence, he concluded its date is about the end of the third century A.
sentences.cn: 基于语言学和古文书学证据，他推论它的日期大约是公元后第三世纪末。
